Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: First, I need to understand what makes a question thought-provoking and open-ended in this context. The questions shouldn't have simple yes/no answers - they should invite deep analysis, critical thinking, and exploration of trade-offs. Since this is for a supply chain process with so many moving parts (multiple countries, different regulations, tech elements), I should focus on areas where complexities intersect: sustainability, risk management, technology integration, human factors, regulatory challenges, and strategic decisions.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
